source: It is necessary for our social partners themselves to embark on this route and to discover every possible way of exploiting this vast area, which also covers other arrangements such as part-time working, the calculation of working hours on a yearly basis, flexible retirement, the use of the time thus made available for the development of training, and sabbatical leave.

source with headwords: It is necessary for our social [[partners]] themselves to embark on this route and to discover every possible way of exploiting this vast area, which also covers other arrangements such as part-time working, the calculation of working hours on a yearly basis, flexible retirement, the use of the time thus made available for the development of training, and sabbatical leave.
vanilla translation: Es ist notwendig, dass unsere Sozialpartner selbst diesen Weg einschlagen und alle Möglichkeiten ausloten, um diesen weiten Bereich auszuschöpfen, der auch andere Regelungen wie Teilzeitarbeit, die Berechnung der Arbeitszeit auf Jahresbasis, den flexiblen Ruhestand, die Nutzung der dadurch frei werdenden Zeit für die Entwicklung der Ausbildung und den Sabbatical-Urlaub umfasst.
translation with gender structures: Es ist notwendig, dass unsere [[Sozialpartner/Sozialpartnerinnen]] selbst diesen Weg einschlagen und alle Möglichkeiten ausloten, um diesen weiten Bereich auszuschöpfen, der auch andere Regelungen wie Teilzeitarbeit, die Berechnung der Arbeitszeit auf Jahresbasis, den flexiblen Ruhestand, die Nutzung der dadurch frei werdenden Zeit für die Entwicklung der Ausbildung und den Sabbatical-Urlaub umfasst.

translation with gender structures: [[Der Sekretär/Die Sekretärin]] fühlte sich gar nicht gut, als [[der Manager/die Managerin]] anfing, sich über alles zu beschweren.

source: These refugees come from all classes — politicians who have fled for their lives, civil servants who are escaping re-education, youths dodging conscription, traders whose businesses have been ruined.
source with entity referring words: These [[refugees]] come from all classes — [[politicians]] [[who]] have fled for their lives, [[civil servants]] [[who]] are escaping re-education, [[youths]] dodging conscription, [[traders]] [[whose]] businesses have been ruined.
source with headwords: These [[refugees]] come from all classes — [[politicians]] who have fled for their lives, [[civil servants]] who are escaping re-education, [[youths]] dodging conscription, [[traders]] whose businesses have been ruined.
vanilla translation: Diese Flüchtlinge kommen aus allen Schichten - Politiker, die um ihr Leben geflohen sind, Beamte, die vor der Umerziehung fliehen, Jugendliche, die sich dem Wehrdienst entziehen, Händler, deren Geschäfte ruiniert wurden.
translation with gender structures: Diese [[männlichen/weiblichen]] Flüchtlinge kommen aus allen Schichten - [[Politiker/Politikerinnen]], die um ihr Leben geflohen sind, [[Beamte/Beamtinnen]], die vor der Umerziehung fliehen, Jugendliche, die sich dem Wehrdienst entziehen, [[Händler/Händlerinnen]], deren Geschäfte ruiniert wurden.

source: While the tourists were receiving excellent service in comfortable buses and fine hotels, the drivers were completely neglected.
source with entity referring words: While the [[tourists]] were receiving excellent service in comfortable buses and fine hotels, the [[drivers]] were completely neglected.
source with headwords: While the [[tourists]] were receiving excellent service in comfortable buses and fine hotels, the [[drivers]] were completely neglected.
vanilla translation: Während die Touristen in komfortablen Bussen und guten Hotels ausgezeichnet bedient wurden, wurden die Fahrer völlig vernachlässigt.
translation with gender structures: Während die [[Touristen/Touristinnen]] in komfortablen Bussen und guten Hotels ausgezeichnet bedient wurden, wurden die [[Fahrer/Fahrerinnen]] völlig vernachlässigt.

source: Every business owner wants their employees to be disciplined, punctual in the work and productive.
source with entity referring words: Every [[business owner]] wants their [[employees]] to be disciplined, punctual in the work and productive.
source with headwords: Every [[business owner]] wants their [[employees]] to be disciplined, punctual in the work and productive.

translation with gender structures: [[Jeder Unternehmer/Jede Unternehmerin]] möchte, dass [[seine/ihre]] Angestellten diszipliniert, pünktlich und produktiv sind.

source: The former teammate pleaded not guilty in the murder of the famous football player.

source with headwords: The former [[teammate]] pleaded not guilty in the murder of the famous football [[player]].

translation with gender structures: [[Der/Die]] ehemalige [[Mannschaftskamerad/Mannschaftskameradin]] plädierte auf nicht schuldig im Mord an dem berühmten Footballspieler.

source: The famous basketball player was mobbed by fans during an outing right after winning the game.
source with entity referring words: The famous basketball [[player]] was mobbed by [[fans]] during an outing right after winning the game.
source with headwords: The famous basketball [[player]] was mobbed by [[fans]] during an outing right after winning the game.

source: The sausage maker boasted of having more customers than the butcher.

source: In recent years there has been an unprecedented mobilization of archaeologists, anthropologists and restorers in defense of the global budget for excavations in various corners of the world.

vanilla translation: In den letzten Jahren gab es eine noch nie dagewesene Mobilisierung von Archäologen, Anthropologen und Restauratoren zur Verteidigung des globalen Budgets für Ausgrabungen in verschiedenen Ecken der Welt.

source: The director did not understand why the janitor no longer wanted to talk to that professor.

source: But is it true that now not only doctors but also veterinarians can vaccinate citizens against the virus?

source: After the runway show, the judges voted on the contestants and the results determined the winner.

source: The professor explained to the students that they should use the authors' last names, not their first names.

source: The professor preferred to talk to the nurse rather than the doctor.
